keyAction01.title: Insert Text 01
keyAction02.title: Insert Text 02

conf.keyAction01.desc: You can input 2-byte characters (e.g. Japanese) and emoji.
conf.keyAction02.desc: Each escape string is supported.["\b": backslash], ["\n": new line], ["\t": Tab]
conf.keyAction03.desc: The ${[HOLD]} keyword can be used to insert the currently selected character.
conf.keyAction05.desc: You can combine the ${[HOLD]} keyword with the Snippets format.
conf.keyAction06.desc: The ${UUID} keyword generates the UUID version 4.
conf.keyAction07.desc: The ${[DATE]} keyword can be used to insert a date. You can set the format and locate after "[DATE]".
conf.keyAction08.desc: The ${[SEQ]} keyword can be used to insert a sequential number. After "[SEQ]", set the "Format:InitialValue:Step".
conf.keyAction09.desc: Using the ${[SEQ]} keyword with the "%c" format will insert the alphabet in order.
conf.keyAction10.desc: If you specify "x" as the initial value and step in the ${[SEQ]} option, an input dialog will appear, allowing you to specify the initial value and step value when executing.
seq.input.prompt: Enter the values for the start and step of the sequence. "start:step"
seq.input.formatError: There is an error in the input format. ("start:step")
